question: What is the rank of India in the Global bribery risk rankings by TRACE?
explanation:
India is placed at 77th position in the Global bribery risk rankings by TRACE, an anti-bribery standard setting organisation.
It measures the business bribery risk in 194 countries, territories, and other regions. Denmark, Norway, Finland, Sweden and New Zealand present the lowest commercial bribery risk. Last year, India stood at 78th rank.
